author: kkolinko
msg: Remove jdbc-pool items from Tomcat 8 changelog.
Those are already included with Tomcat 7.0.27.

author: kkolinko
msg: catalina.tasks in Tomcat 6 and later define both "jasper" and "jasper2" as synonyms.
I think we can remove this old task name in Tomcat 8.

author: veithen
msg: Don't lie. axis2-integration doesn't have any integration tests for axis2-jaxbri.

author: kkolinko
msg: Some tasks were missing from jmxaccessor.tasks even though they were documented in monitoring.html.
Some tasks were missing from antlib.xml
jkstatus task had a different name. I think jkupdate is a better name for it.
(Neither one of jk* tasks is documented, and mod_jk has a different set of Ant tasks with it).

author: jbonofre
msg: Update the documentation adding the core configuration section
